text: The Roter Graben is a river of Saxony, Germany. It rises northeast of Dresden in Dresden Heath. It is a left tributary of the Große Röder in , an Ortsteil of Ottendorf-Okrilla. ==See also== *List of rivers of Saxony == References == Category:Rivers of Saxony Category:Rivers of Germany
title: Roter Graben (Große Röder)
